……ふぅ。今日の探索の成果はそこそこといったところか。\n鑑も不知火の操縦にずい:
...Phew. That's about the extent of today's investigation.
Kagami seems to have gotten quite used to piloting Shiranui.
うん！ みんながサポートしてくれたおかげだよ！\nメイズがホント迷路なのはぜんぜ:
Yeah! It's all thanks to everyone's support!
I can't get used to Maze really being a maze at all, though...
そうですね、最初は本当に大変でした……: That's right. It was really hard at first...
坑道が入り組んでて、メイズシフターもいて、\n帰ってくるだけでも一苦労でしたから:
There were a lot of tunnels, and there was a maise shifter, too
It was a lot of work just to get back...
うむ……衛士として戦ってきた経験は残っているが、\nそれだけでは対処が難しいから:
Hmm... I still have some experience fighting as an Eishi,
That alone would be difficult to deal with...
だが、それでもゆっくりと前進していけばよい。\nそれが結果的には我々と学園の両方:
But even so, all she had to do was slowly move forward.
In the end, that will benefit both us and the school.
うん、そうだね。色々親切にしてもらったし、\n早くみんなの役に立てるようになりた:
Yeah, that's right. You've been so kind to me,
I hope I can be of use to everyone soon.
そうですね。今日も、ちょっと危ない場面がありましたし。: That's right. There was a dangerous situation again today.
しっかりと記憶もないのも大変だよねぇ。\n私なんてシミュレーターで、最初から勉強:
It's hard not having a good memory.
I'm a simulator, and I've been exhausted from studying from the start.
ふふ、一つ一つ着実に学んでいくしかなかろう。\n鑑の成長は目を見張るものがあるぞ:
Haha. I'll just have to learn them one by one.
Kagami's growth is remarkable.
えへへ、そうかな？ よーし、頑張るぞー！: Ehehe, really? All right, let's do our best!
……あれ、わたし達の他にも\nちょうど地上に上がってきた人がいるみたい。:
...Huh? There's something else besides us.
Looks like someone just came up to the surface.
一機だけか？ ……妙だな。\nメイズに潜るにはチームを組むことが必須のはず。:
Just one? ...That's strange.
In order to dive into the maise, it should be necessary to form a team.
そういえば榊野さんってたった一人だけで、\nチームとして認められたんだっけ！:
Come to think of it, Sakakino-san was the only one...
We were recognized as a team, right?!
うん、そう。私についてこれる人がいなかったし、\n面倒だったから生徒会長に言った:
Yeah, that's right. There wasn't anyone who could keep up with me,
It was a pain, so I told the student council president, and she approved.
ほう……あの苛烈なメイズ内を単機で探索できるとは、\n見事な才能だな。:
Oh... I didn't think I'd be able to explore that harsh maise on my own.
That's some impressive talent.
……ん？ どうした？ 何を見ているんだ？: ...Hm? What's wrong? What are you looking at?
……そっちじゃない。\nそのピッタリとしてる服……気になる。:
...That's not it.
Those tight clothes... I'm curious.
ああ、衛士強化装備のことか。: Oh, you mean the Eishi Enhanced Armament?
……やっぱり気になるよねえ。\nかなり体のラインが出ちゃって、際どいもんね……:
...I'm still curious.
There's a lot of curves in her body, so it's pretty dangerous...
わたしはあんまり慣れた感じが無くて、\nまわりに人がいるとちょっと気になっちゃう:
I didn't really feel like I was used to it.
When there's people around, I get a little worried...
一応、そういう羞恥心に耐える訓練も兼ねてるんですけどね。: It's partly training to endure that kind of shame, though.
でも、機能は凄いですし……\nなんだかんだ、着慣れると安心感があるんですよね。:
But it's so functional...
For some reason, once you get used to wearing it, you feel at ease.
どういった部分が気になったのだ？\n我々としてはそちらの制服も興味はあるが……:
What part of it was bothering you?
We're interested in your uniform as well, but...
衛士強化装備？ っていうの、この素材は何？: Eishi Enhanced Armament? Wait, what's this material?
ああ、特殊保護被膜といって、普段は柔らかいが、\n瞬間的な圧力が加わると硬化して:
Ah, it's called a special protective coating, which is usually soft
When a momentary pressure is applied, it hardens, protecting itself from impact.
全身の筋電圧の変化と脳波を照合して数値化、\n戦術機の操縦を補助する役割も持って:
I compared the changes in muscle voltage all over my body with my brain waves and quantified them
It also has the role of assisting in piloting TSFs.
なるほど……思った以上に高性能。: I see... It's more high-performance than I thought.
ああ。着用している時にデータも計測されている。\nだから肉体の状態もある程度は管:
Yes. The data is also measured when you're wearing it.
That's why she manages my body to some extent.
戦術機に乗っている時であれば、\n機体の電力で充電して長時間の稼働にも耐えうる。:
If you're on a TSF,
It can be charged with the power of the aircraft and can withstand long-term operation.
つまり、そっちの乗ってる……戦術機？ と紐づいている？: In other words, it's connected to that... TSF you're riding?
ああ、そういう認識で問題はない。\n衛士としての戦闘をフォローしてくれる装備だ。:
Yeah, there's no problem with that perception.
It's a piece of equipment that backs me up in battle as an Eishi.
飲料水パックも内蔵している。\n長時間の戦闘で脱水状態になった場合の対策もされて:
It also has a bottle of drinking water.
They also had countermeasures in case they got dehydrated after a long battle.
興味深い……サバイバルでも水の確保は重要。\n確かにそういう機能は欲しい。:
Interesting... Securing water is important for survival as well.
I definitely want that kind of function.
むしろ、我々としてはそちらの装備も興味があるがな。\n普段着のような見た目で高機:
If anything, we're interested in your equipment as well.
It looks like normal clothes, and it's highly functional, isn't it?
あまり自覚はなかったけど、確かにそう。: I wasn't really aware of it, but it was true.
――ヒイロさん、御剣さんの強化装備をすっごく見てますね。\nやっぱり珍しい装備だ:
—Hiiro-san, you're really looking at Mitsurugi's Enhanced Armament.
I guess she's interested because it's a rare piece of equipment after all?
……うーん、榊野さんに他意はないんだろうけど、\nあんな風に体のラインをマジマジ:
...Hmm, Sakakino-san probably has no ulterior motives, but...
When I think about how she's staring at my body like that...
やっぱり気になってきちゃうかも……\nうう、けっこう露出あるし……:
I think I'm starting to get curious...
Ugh, it's pretty exposed...
珠瀬さんは、気になったりしない？\n女の子相手でもちょっと恥ずかしいかも……:
Tamase-san, are you curious?
It might be a little embarrassing to deal with a girl...
改めて言われるとちょっと気になってきますね。\n特にこの世界の学園の人たちは普通:
Now that you mention it again, I'm a little curious.
Especially since the people of this world's academy are wearing normal uniforms...
そうそう！ あの制服、可愛くて羨ましいよね！\nわたしもあんな風な可愛い制服を着:
That's right! That uniform is so cute, I'm jealous!
I want to wear that cute uniform, too...
分かります。わたし達の服とか装備って、\nああいう可愛い制服と違って軍装の機能性:
I understand. Our clothes and equipment...
Unlike cute uniforms like that, military uniforms focus on functionality.
んー、ならせめてオシャレ用の服を買ってみようかな。\nこの前、すごく素敵な服を売:
Hmm, maybe I should at least buy some fancy clothes.
The other day, I found a shop that sells really nice clothes!
折角だし、今度のお休みに一緒に買い物に行かない？: Since you're here, why don't we go shopping together on our next day off?
いいんですか？ なら、一緒に行きましょう！\n一緒にお買い物、楽しみですっ♪:
Are you sure? Then let's go together!
I'm looking forward to shopping with you! ♪
折角なら、こっちの学園で知り合った子も、\n誘っちゃうってのはどうかな？:
At this point, even the girl I met at this school...
Why don't we invite her?
それなら、めるちゃんにも連絡とってみよっと♪\n……そういえば、御剣さん達も盛り:
In that case, I'll try contacting Mechan too♪
...Come to think of it, Mitsurugi and the others are getting excited too.
――とうわけだな。\nこの刀自体は強化装備の一部ではないが大切なものだ。:
――So that's how it is.
This katana itself wasn't part of the Enhanced Armament, but it was important
なるほど……私のネイルガンと一緒なんだ。思い入れは重要。: I see... It's the same as my nail gun. Love is important.
ああ、その通りだ。\nふふ。この感覚が異郷でも通じるのは嬉しいな。:
Yeah, that's right.
Hehe. I'm happy that this feeling can be felt even in a foreign land.
でも、その素材は実際に硬くなるの？\nあんまりイメージが出来ない。:
But will that material actually get harder?
I can't really picture it.
よかったら実際に触ってみるか？\nこういったものは体感する方が分かりやすいだろう:
Would you like to actually touch it?
It's probably easier to understand these things when you feel them.
いいの？ なら、ぜひ触ってみたい。: Are you sure? In that case, I'd love to touch you.
ああ、好きに触れるといい。: Yeah, feel free to touch it.
衝撃から身を守る以外にも、\n防刃仕様、耐熱耐寒、化学物質にも耐えられる。:
Aside from protecting myself from the impact,
Blade resistance, heat resistance, cold resistance, and even chemical resistance.
そんな風には見えないけど……\nん、柔らかい……本当に？:
It doesn't look like it, but...
Mm, it's soft... Really?
今度は力を込めて叩いてみるがよい。: Try hitting it with all your might this time.
なるほど。強く叩いたら硬くなった……！\n不思議な感じ……:
I see. It got harder when I hit it hard...!
It's a strange feeling...
おお、強く突いても早く突いても硬くなる……\nでも、ゆっくりやると柔らかい……不:
Ooh, no matter how hard I thrust or how fast I thrust, it gets hard...
But it's soft when you do it slowly... It's strange...
なるほど……これがいざという時に体を守るんだ。: I see... So this is what it means to protect yourself when the time comes.
ああ。他にも機能はあるのだが、この素材は傷口に対して、\nすぐに浸透して止血する:
Yeah. It has other functions, but this material is used against wounds.
It also has the effect of immediately permeating and stopping the bleeding.
そちらの制服も優れているだろうが、\nいざという時の負傷に関してはこちらの装備が:
I'm sure your uniform is excellent too, but...
When it comes to injuries in times of emergency, our equipment...
これは……面白い。癖になる。\nさわさわ……:
This is... interesting. It's addicting.
Rub, rub...
……まぁ、気に入ったのなら好きにするがよい。: ...Well, if you like it, do as you please.
うん、ありがとう。\nお言葉に甘えて……つんつん。:
Yeah, thanks.
I'll take you up on your offer... poke, poke.
この被膜は溶解剤で溶かす事ができるのだが、\n万が一に怪我をした場合には――:
This membrane can be melted with a dissolving agent, but...
In the unlikely event of an injury—
ダメ。そんなのはとても勿体ない。\nこの感触がなくなるのは損失:
No. That would be a waste.
Losing this feeling is a loss.
とても素晴らしい。\n……どうにかして、手に入らない？:
Very wonderful.
...Can't I get it somehow?
そうだな……生徒会長の元で皮膜だけは、\n同等のものを作れる目処が立ったと聞いて:
That's right... The membrane under the student council president...
I've heard that you have a good idea of how to make something of the same quality, but...
なるほど……聞きに行ってくる。\nどうにかして貰いたい。:
I see... I'll go ask.
I want her to do something about it.
……装備としてではなく、\n感触を楽しむ目的になっていないか？:
...Not as equipment,
Isn't that why you're enjoying the sensation?
……だって、このぷにぷに感は魅力的。\n出来るならずっと触っていたい。:
...After all, this squishy feeling is attractive.
I want to keep touching her if I can.
良い装備を見せてくれてありがとう。: Thank you for showing me your good equipment.
おかげで色々と参考に出来たし……\n冥夜達が、どれだけ大変な環境にいたのかも分か:
Thanks to that, I was able to learn a lot from her...
I also know how hard Meiya and the others were in this environment.
私達が制服でもいいのは、これで事足りるから。\nそれだけ機能を付けるのは危険な場:
This is enough for us to wear our uniforms.
I only added that much functionality because I was in a dangerous place.
だからあれだけのＭＧを操縦する腕前がある。\nそんな場所で生きてきたあなた達を私:
That's why she's so good at piloting MGs.
I respect you for living in such a place.
だから、またどこかで機会があれば、\n一緒に戦えれば嬉しい。:
That's why, if I get another chance somewhere,
I'd be happy if we could fight together.
きっと、私のまだ知らない、あなた達の強さを知れるから。\nそれじゃあ、待たね。:
I'm sure I'll be able to learn how strong you are, something I don't know yet.
Well then, I'll wait.
……なんだか不思議な人だけど、\nでも……すごくいい子なんだね。:
...She's a strange person, but...
But... she's a really good girl.
む？ どうした？\n何か忘れたのか？:
Hm? What's wrong?
Did you forget something?
……触り収めをしてなかった。\nもうちょっとだけ、感触を楽しみたい。:
...I didn't touch it.
I want to enjoy the sensation just a little longer.
ま、待て、ヒイロ！ さっきまで真面目な話を……！\nええい、無言でつつくな！:
W-Wait, Hiiro! We were just talking about something serious...!
Argh, don't poke me in silence!
